xsec.fit_opts: -v 1 --setParameters gamma=1,MH=125.38 --setParameterRanges gamma=0,50 --X-rtd FITTER_NEW_CROSSING_ALGO --X-rtd FITTER_BOUND --saveSpecifiedNuis all --saveInactivePOI 1 +--setParameters gamma=1,MH=125.38 --setParameterRanges gamma=0,50 --robustFit=1 --setRobustFitAlgo=Minuit2,Migrad --X-rtd FITTER_NEW_CROSSING_ALGO --setRobustFitTolerance=0.1 --X-rtd FITTER_NEVER_GIVE_UP --X-rtd FITTER_BOUND --cminFallbackAlgo "Minuit2,0:1." --saveSpecifiedNuis all --saveInactivePOI 1 --saveWorkspace
